content: X-EGN MX Steel nails (collated) Ultimate-performance collated nails for fastening to steel using the GX 120 gas nailer ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate-performance nail for steel Long, conical tip and high hardness – for excellent fastening quality Applications Fastening to steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 3/16 in Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Base materials | Steel | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 3/16 in | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.12 in | Point type | Ballistic point | Approvals | ICC-ES | For use with (tools) | GX 120 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 3774258 - Kit X-EGN 14 MX + GC 21 - Package Size 750 pc Package Contents: - 750x Gas nail X-EGN 14 MX - 1x Gas canister GC 22 - 3454025 - Kit X-EGN 14 MX + GC 22 15k - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 15000x Gas nail X-EGN 14 MX - 20x Gas canister GC 22 - 3454032 - Kit X-EGN 14 MX + GC 22 27k - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 27000x Gas nail X-EGN 14 MX - 36x Gas canister GC 22
